titles.title: Creating Advanced Streamlined Electronic Services (CASES) for Constituents Act of 2017
Creating Advanced Streamlined Electronic Services (CASES) for Constituents Act of 2017
To amend section 552a of title 5, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Privacy Act) to require agencies to accept electronic release forms, and for other purposes.
Creating Advanced Streamlined Electronic Services (CASES) for Constituents Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
